sentences.en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentences.cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentences.en: Condoms are an effective method of birth control if used with care.
sentences.cn: 如果使用得当，避孕套是很有效的避孕手段。

sentences.en: Eisenhower used his muscle to persuade Congress to change the law.
sentences.cn: 艾森豪威尔用他的影响力说服国会修改了该项法律。

sentences.en: I do the dishes every day, so I’m used to it.
sentences.cn: 我每天洗盘子，所以习惯了。

sentences.en: I used my thumbnail to tighten the screw on my lamp.
sentences.cn: 我用拇指指甲把台灯上的螺钉拧紧了。

sentences.en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
sentences.cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

sentences.en: Naomi used to go to church in Granville every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米以前每个星期天都去格兰维尔的教堂做礼拜。

sentences.en: The device had been used operationally some months previously.
sentences.cn: 该设备几个月之前曾投入运行。

sentences.en: The newspaper used the neologism "dinks", Double Income No Kids.
sentences.cn: 报纸使用了新词“丁克族”，即“双收入无子女”。

sentences.en: The space underneath could be used as a storage area.
sentences.cn: 底下的空间可用作储藏区。

sentences.en: These expressions are often used interchangeably, but they do have different meanings.
sentences.cn: 这些表达方式经常相互替代使用，但它们的含义却有所不同。

sentences.en: They used a lorry to ram the main gate.
They used force to banish the natives from the more fertile land.
sentences.cn: 他们使用武力把土著居民驱逐出了比较肥沃的土地。

sentences.en: They used to buy ten kilos of beef in one lump.
sentences.cn: 他们过去常买10公斤重的整块牛肉。

sentences.en: This type of surgery could even be used to extract cancerous growths.
sentences.cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

sentences.en: Too bad he used his intelligence for criminal purposes.
sentences.cn: 他把聪明都用在了犯罪上，太可惜了。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
有用的，有益的；有帮助的
习惯的；二手的，使用过的

phrases.tran_cn: 过去常常，过去曾经；过去常常做某事
用完了的；筋疲力尽；被杀死的

trans.tran_cn: 使用，利用，运用，服用，消耗（use的过去式）
